item.title: Slider (creative business)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" gap="35" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1491952362624{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]

Nexx Creative Business

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]Nexx is a unique flexible multi-purpose theme for every business and creative professional. A great collection of homepages and inner pages, researched and developed for the most popular business niches. Earn more clients right now. Just try it.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]

[contact-form-7 id="" title="Contact form 1"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Alice Milbrandt

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493157737430{margin-top: -29px !important;}"]Use ‘One-Click’ import to get a head start and save valuable time when building your website. Just try and convince yourself.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492629494816{margin-top: -5px !important;}"]

item.title: About Us (creative business)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1491955301603{padding-top: 300px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(http://nexarthemes.com/nexx/creative-business/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2017/04/about-us.jpg?id=30) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1491955231679{background-color: #eeeeee !important;}"][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491955405414{padding-top: 6px !important;}"]

how we do it

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Few Words About Us

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493145992957{margin-top: -5px !important;}"]Nexx is an excellent theme series allowing you to build your site the easy way, and it lets you tell your story in a powerful way.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1491955231679{background-color: #eeeeee !important;}"][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491955496055{padding-top: 6px !important;}"]

how we do it

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Few Words About Us

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493146097422{margin-top: -5px !important;}"]

You can effortlessly create your website with One Click Install. Content, images, theme options and even sliders are automatically imported.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1491955663602{padding-top: 300px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(http://nexarthemes.com/nexx/creative-business/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2017/04/about-me-2.jpg?id=69) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Our Clients (creative business)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492630156317{padding-top: 65px !important;}"]

Trusted By The Best

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Almost every layout or styling option can be set using the Theme Options Panel. Go on and see impressive features in action!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="35" css=".vc_custom_1491994739457{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="36" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491956845006{padding-top: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493140705782{margin-top: -35px !important;}"]

Get started with only one click! Content, images, theme options and even sliders are automatically imported in the process.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492630197659{margin-top: -15px !important;}"]

jeff sloan

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492630207621{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

President

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="76" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491956885625{padding-top: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493140726304{margin-top: -35px !important;}"]

When you purchase Nexx, you get professional support and lifetime updates and there’s a support team taking care of everything.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492630226955{margin-top: -15px !important;}"]

julie ross

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492630237624{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

Manager

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="31" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1491956853428{padding-top: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493140750581{margin-top: -35px !important;}"]

Nexx is a great collection of homepages, researched and developed for the most popular business niches. Meet a great business.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492630257743{margin-top: -15px !important;}"]

fred dube

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492630267243{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

Director

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Contact form 1

item.content:encoded:

The date is before the earliest one allowed. The date is after the latest one allowed. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The file is too big. There was an error uploading the file. The number format is invalid. The number is smaller than the minimum allowed. The number is larger than the maximum allowed. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Your entered code is incorrect. The e-mail address entered is invalid. The URL is invalid. The telephone number is invalid.
